articles.title: Calls for adorning 50th birthday of DPRK issued
articles.content:
Calls for adorning 50th birthday of DPRK issued
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and Central Military Commission issued calls on Monday for adorning the 50th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
   In the calls, they say the founding of the DPRK by President Kim Il Sung on September 9, Juche 37 (1948) was a historic event that opened a new epoch of building a socialist state centred on the masses of people.
   They express firm belief that the party members, people's army soldiers and all other people of korea will join in the great forced march for the prosperity of the socialist motherland with indomitable revolutionary spirit and warm patriotism and adorn the national day this year with a grand festival of socialist victors.
   They describe President Kim Il Sung as the father of the country and the eternal leader of the Korean people who started the Juche revolution, founded the party, the government and the army and performed imperishable revolutionary exploits.
   They call for learning his revolutionary ideas more deeply and exalting his revolutionary life and great exploits for all ages.
   They also call for defending the headquarters of revolution led by General Kim Jong Il at the risk of life and resolutely safeguarding and exalting his revolutionary exploits forever.
   They say as follows:
   "Wholehearted unity is the mainstay of our revolution.
   "Long live the wholehearted unity of the party, the army and the people around  General Kim Jong Il "
   They call for deeply loving, resolutely defending and further exalting the Korean socialism, saying that the DPRK is a great socialist country that defends the life and destiny of the Korean people and a banner of independence, sovereignty and eternal prosperity of the nation.
   As regards the modelling of the whole society on the Juche idea, they call for strictly implementing the revolutionary line of independence, self-sufficiency and self-reliance in national defence and increasing the might of the socialist country under the banner of the Juche idea.
   They call for establishing the monolithic ideological system more firmly throughout the party, adding that the WPK is a great guide that leads the country, the people and the revolution to victory in a responsible manner. 
   They call for resolutely defending and faithfully carrying forward the glorious revolutionary traditions of the WPK and making the revolution with belief in the people and in reliance on them, as wished by President Kim Il Sung.
   Referring to the WPK's motto "the people are god", they call for turning the whole society into a united and karmonious large family of socialism under the benevolent, magnanimous politics of the WPK.
   They call for intensifying ideological education so that the party members and all other working people can be intensely loyal and dutiful to the party and the leader.
   Especially, they call for imbuing the whole society with the red flag spirit of the party, living in the Korean way and giving full play to the Korean-nation-first spirit.
   They also call for enhancing the class awakening among the party members and other working people and invigorating the class struggle against all sorts of enemy's activities in the rigorous situation today.
   They refer to the party's idea of attaching importance to military affairs.
   The revolutionary bayonet is a guarantee for the security of the country and the people and the destiny of socialism, they say, putting forward concrete tasks to consolidate the military foothold of Korean socialism as an impregnable fortress.
   They call for strengthening the People's Army, the pillar and main force of the Juche revolution, into the army of the leader, the party and the revolution.
   They further say:
   "Let us become heroic human bombs and suicide squads in the battle to defend our respected supreme commander General Kim Jong Il with our lives  "You must answer the appeasement strategy of imperialism with revolutionary principle, and invasion with revolutionary war    "A revolutionary habit of training must be established throughout the army so that every soldier can be a match for a hundred foes    "You must mercilessly annihilate the enemies if they violate even an inch of our land and a blade of grass    "Let us smash the U.S.  aggressors at a stroke and reunify the country if they unleash another war "   They call for consolidating the all-people and nationwide defence system, true to the party's policy of arming all people and fortifying the whole country.
   They put forward concrete tasks to organise social life in conformity with the intrinsic nature of Juche socialism.
   They call for bringing into full play the advantages of the Korean socialist system based on collectivism, establishing a social ethos of respecting revolutionary forerunners, carrying forward the tradition of revolutionary comradeship and building a cultural way of life and entertainment.
    They call for strengthening the function and role of the public security, judicial and procuratorial organs in every way, and call for workers of those domains to intensify the people's democratic dictatorship and decisively smash the subversive activities and sabotages of the class enemy.
   They call for thoroughly preventing the ideological and cultural poisoning by imperialism as well as the infiltration of the yellow wind of capitalism into the minds of the people.
   They call upon working people's organisations to uphold the leadership of the party.
   They call upon the young people unfailingly loyal to the revolutionary cause of the party to  firmly grasp the relay baton of revolution and carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation.
   They say the whole party and all the people should direct their utmost efforts to economic construction, and call for consolidating the economic fortress of Korean socialism in the heat of the forced march for the final victory.
   They say:
   "Let us become honorable victors in the forced march in hearty response to the call of the party, upholding the slogan 'When the party is determined, we can do anything '    "Let us ride Chollima again to vie with time    "Let us follow the example of the Songjin Steel Complex to effect a new great Chollima upswing in socialist construction    "Let us stand true to our party's basic line of socialist economic construction and fully demonstrate the potentials of the independent national economy with heavy industries at the core "
   In the calls, the WPK Central Committee and the WPK Central Military Commission ask the whole party, the whole country and all the people to concentrate on agriculture, coal industry, electric power industry, railway transport and metal industry, the main fronts of socialist economic construction.
   They say the agricultrual front is as important in socialist economic construction as height 1211 was during the last Korean War, and call for pooling nationwide efforts to do farming and directing all the efforts to carrying through the agriculture-first policy of their party.
   They call upon working people in the industrial domain to demonstrate their heroic spirit again in the ongoing forced march for the final victory as they did when building socialism on the war ruins in the 1950s.
   They call for building up Pyongyang into a  more grandiose and wonderful capital city and for turning the country into a land as beautiful as a golden tapestry good to live in through successful land development and management.
   They call upon scientists and technicians to firmly defend and add lustre to Korean socialism with science and technology.
   They say for the victory in the forced march to defend the socialist fortress firmly it is necessary to give full play to the revolutionary spirit of servicemen, and call for imbuing all the people with this  spirit to create something from nothing and bring about miracles and innovations.
   In the calls, they say:
   "Self-reliance is the only way out. To live through self-reliance on this land under this sky is our party's fixed stand and its invariable way of making revolution."
   The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the WPK Central Military Commission call for strictly rejecting an iota of capitalism in economic management, standing true to the Juche-based principle of socialist economic management and fully displaying the advantages of the planned economy.
   They call on all officials to change their habit of work so that the spirit of the forced march may sweep the whole country.
   They call for pushing ahead with cultural development, bringing socialist national culture of Juche into full bloom, radically improving the quality of education and creating more works and music as masterpieces of the era.
   They call for carrying out the instructions of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
   They call for holding fast to the three major charters of national reunification and joining in the nationwide struggle for the reunification of the country.
   They urge the South Korean authorities to make a bold decision to replace the anti-north confrontation policy with a pro-north reconciliation policy.
   They call on the 70 million Koreans to uphold  leader of the nation General Kim Jong Il as the lodestar of national reunification, join in the patriotic cause of reunification and hand a unified country to posterity. 
   They refer to the tasks to develop international relations, saying:
   "Let us unite firmly with all people of the world who advocate independence."
   "Let us strengthen solidarity with all the revolutionary parties and progressive peoples  of the world and defend and Push ahead with the socialist cause under the banner of the Pyongyang Declaration."
   "Let us strengthen the nonaligned movement under the banner of anti-imperialism and independence."  "Let us check the arbitrariness of imperialism in international relations, democratize international politics and establish a fair international order and new economic order "
   The Korean people are determined to complete the Juche revolution under the eternal banner of the DPRK, they say, adding: "Let us see who laughs last. Victory belongs to us. "
   "This is the faith and courage of our party and people."
   They call on the party members and all other working people to unite closer around the Party Central Committee headed by General Kim Jong Il, brave the difficulties and win great victory in all sectors of socialist construction so that this year marking the 50th birthday of the DPRK may be recorded in the history of the country as a proud year of new advance, great revolutionary upswing and great change in the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Invariable ambition for aggression
articles.content:
Invariable ambition for aggression
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Reconnaissance planes belonging to the U.S. Pacific Command have made flights almost every day for the purpose of espionage on the DPRK, while "stealth" bombers and latest-type fighters equipped with special missiles have been deployed forward for military exercises for striking the DPRK's underground fortresses, according to a news report.
   The U.S. warhawks are alleging that the intentional opening to the public of the sophisticated combat equipment is aimed at "deterring the DPRK's possible invasion."
   What they really seek, however, is to justify their criminal military buildup and complete war preparations under the pretext of the DPRK's "threat."
   For this purpose, the united states sent an "F-15" Flying Corps, several fighter-bombers and two gunboats to South Korea in February. In March it reorganized the U.S. 8th Army in South Korea into a field army system and decided on an additional supply to the South Korean puppets of 168 long-distance multiple rocket launchers, 112 new-type launchers and other sophisticated combat equipment.
   The facts show that a war may break out on the Korean peninsula any moment due to the U.S. warmaniacs' arms buildup.
   Though the united states is paying lip-service to peace on the Korean peninsula, its invariable aggressive design  and military policy against the DPRK remain unchanged.
   If the United States is truly interested in peace on the peninsula, it should withdraw its aggression forces from South Korea and its vicinity. Only then, can the danger of war be removed and an atmosphere of peace created on the peninsula.
   We do not want war. But we never tolerate anyone who tries to hurt the dignity of our nation and the sovereignty of our country.
   If the United States persistently seeks war and confrontation, ignoring our efforts for peace, our people and army will answer its aggression with a thousandfold retalitation.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK espionage flights
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK espionage flights
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Spy planes of the command of the U.S. Forces in the Pacific region made flights for espionage on North Korea and other countries in Asia, the "Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation"  of South Korea said on April 19.
   The U.S. is committing espionage with Japan, Okinawa  in particular, as its base, the radio said,  noting that the reconnaissance planes of the Japan-based U.S. Forces are collecting North Korea-related information.
   The high-altitude reconnaissance planes of the Japan-based U.S. Forces are aimed at "keeping an eye on north Korea's movements on the ground" as well as "missile movements", it said.
   The fighter planes of the U.S. Forces are loaded with special missiles aiming at North Korea, it noted.

articles.title: Cuban military attache gives party
articles.content:
Cuban military attache gives party
  Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Alfonso Rodriguez Perez, military attache of the Cuban embassy here, gave a party at the Taedonggang House for diplomatic corps on April 20 on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban people in Playa Giron Battle.
   Invited to the party were Vice-Minister Jong Chang Ryol of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the Korean people's army, foreign diplomatic envoys  and military attaches here.
   Cuban ambassador to Korea Jose Ramon Rodriguez Varona and embassy officials were present.
   Speeches were made at the party.

articles.title: Nation-wide organisation of the unemployed to be formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nation-wide organisation of the unemployed to be formed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Kwon Yong Gil, representative of the "People's Victory 21" in South Korea, in a press conference on April 15 declared that they would hold an inaugural ceremony of unemployment measure headquarters and form a nation-wide organisation of the unemployed, according to a radio report from Seoul.
   He accused the puppet authorities of taking no fundamental measure against unemployment even after the business groups were  recklessly  introducing the lay-off system. He said that the unemployed should retake their rights by their own action.
   The "People's Victory 21" will hold a rally of the unemployed at the Seoul railway station plaza on April 23 and  request the puppet clique to take practical measures for the unemployed, he said.

articles.title: Korean ambassador to Russia appointed
articles.content:
Korean ambassador to Russia appointed 
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun was appointed Korean  ambassador e. p. To Russia, according to a decree of the Central People's Committee of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: Indian party leader arrives
articles.content:
Indian party leader arrives
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Debabrata Biswas, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, arrived here today.
   The guest was greeted at the airport by Choe Jin Su, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Pyongyang meeting marking 50th anniversary of convocation of North-South Joint Conference
articles.content:
Pyongyang meeting marking 50th anniversary of convocation of North-South Joint Conference
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on April 21 to mark the 50th anniversary of the historic Joint Conference of representatives of political parties and public organisations in the north and south of Korea.
   Yang Hyong Sop, alternate politburo member of the WPK Central committee and Chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report at the meeting.
   The April Joint Conference was the first pan-national assembly in which representatives of political parties and public organisations in the north and south, who were different from each other in ideology, ideal, political view and religious belief sat together for the first time after the liberation of the country, sincerely discussed the measures common to the nation and reached the consensus of views and ensured the unity of action= it was an epochal event which recorded a brilliant chapter in the history of the Korean people's struggle for the reunification of the country, the reporter said, and went on:
   The fatherly leader President Kim Il Sung comprehensively clarified the three principles of national reunification --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- the proposal for founding the Democratic Confederal Republic of Koryo and "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country", which constitute the three pillars of national reunification, and other Juche-orientated programme and ways of reunification and wisely led the struggle for their materialisation.
   His plan for great national unity and line of national reunification are being successfully realized by General kim Jong Il. 
   Seeing through the ardent desire of the fellow countrymen to achieve the reunification of the country by concerted efforts of the nation and the requirements of the era, General Kim Jong Il in his work "Let us reunify the country independently and peacefully through the great unity of the entire nation" comprehensively indicated the essence and principle, the tasks and ways of great national unity.
   To achieve great national unity at present, it is necessary to replace inter-KOREAN relations of acute confrontation with relations of reconciliation and unity, reject outside domination and interference and wage a vigorous struggle against the traitors to the nation and anti-reunification forces who are in collusion with outsiders.
   All the Koreans in the north, south and abroad must hold contacts and visit one another, promote dialogue and strengthen solidarity.
   Inter-Korean relations  have been placed in the worst plight and a  thick barrier has been laid in the way of national reunification by the "civilian"-veiled traitors who had engaged themselves in flunkeyism and dependence on foreign forces in south korea. This more urgently requires that the principle of national independence be observed.
   South Korean politicians who truly want to take the road of patriotism for the country and the nation must not follow their predecessors' political mode of depending on outsiders but make a  resolute decision to solve the reunification issue, the internal affair of the nation, in concert with the fellow countrymen.
   The United States should give up their aggressive ambition to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, withdraw its troops from South Korea and refrain from doing things obstructive to the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula and national unity.
